location_long_descr:
The castle in Troja is surrounded by a large Italian-style terraced castle garden with numerous fountains, terracotta vases, busts, etc. The entire eastern part of the castle park is occupied by a garden with a centrally located labyrinth. It is made of hornbeam bushes and water obstacles - ditches.
The park near the Troj Castle is freely accessible to everyone during visiting hours and offers a beautiful view not only of the castle, but also of the surrounding vineyard with the chapel of St. Clary . There is a fountain with a water jet in the middle of the park, and a garden maze is hidden on the edge.
